product_name: The North Face Boxed Warm Zip-T Neck Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Providing maximum thermal protection and moisture managment for low-to-medium intensity activities, The North Face Boxed Warm Zip-T Neck top keeps you comfortable in cold weather. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams which are designed to enhance motion. Quarter-length zipper ventilates instantly. The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck top has a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: Providing maximum thermal protection and moisture managment for low-to-medium intensity activities, The North Face Boxed Warm Zip-T Neck top keeps you comfortable in cold weather.
